94.1 MC, Channel 231
Phone: AShberry 3-6767
K P FA
2207 Shattuck Avenue
Berkeley 4, California
A NON-PROFIT L I S T E N E R - S P O N S O R E D RADIO STATION
June 15, 1953
Mr* Burton Paulu
Radio Station KUOM
University of Minnesota
Minneapolis, Minnesota
Dear Mr* Paulus
At the request of Graydon Ausmus, I am forwarding to
you and the other members of the Executive Committee
of the NAEB the relevant sections of KFPA’s program
proposal to the ETRC* It is hoped that the programs
detailed therein will provide an adequate basis for
discussion at the June 21st meeting concerning the
exact details of the 130,000 grant for the production
of programs for the NAEB by Radio Station KPPA.
I am looking forward to meeting you in Chicago on
June 21st.
Station Director
s •
end. ETRC Memo
PACIFICA FOUNDATION
OWNED AND
OPERATED BY
